attacks.name: Spinning Tail
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Bite Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or a Pokémon-{EX}, this attack does 100 more damage.
